verify_login: SELECT login_key FROM player_user WHERE login_email = $1;
create_player_session: INSERT INTO player_session (player_user_id, session_token, session_socket, session_meta) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4);
create_player_user: INSERT INTO player_user (login_email, login_key, display_name) VALUES ($1, $2, $3);
